p: Standard solutions were prepared by dilution of a stock solution (50 mg·mL −1) prepared from the two main components of each essential oil in the following concentrations: EO- R. officinalis, 1,8-cineol (20 mg·mL −1) and camphor (30 mg·mL −1) and EO- L. dentata, β-pinene (7 mg·mL −1) and 1,8-cineol (43 mg·mL −1).
